VASSAL.tools.image

Class RenderingClues

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.RenderingHints
      • VASSAL.tools.image.RenderingClues
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Deprecated. 
    All scaling is now done via the high-quality scaler.

    @Deprecated
public class RenderingClues
extends java.awt.RenderingHints
    Adds additional hints to RenderingHints.
    Since:
    3.1.0
